card_name: Fir, Heir of the Sword Saint
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Wo Dao[/i] – Whenever Fir, Heir of the Sword Saint enters or attacks, she deals damage equal to her power to up to one target creature. If that creature dies this turn, put a +1/+1 counter onto Fir.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Fir deals combat damage to a player, double the number of counters on target permanent you control.
